message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I'm asking for $14,000. I think you'll find this to be a fair price.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob.  While $12,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,200. This price reflects the true value of the product.
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,800 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
